entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assemblies returned from AppDomain.AssemblyResolve are checked for matching strong name #101029
  • JIT: CSE removes throwing modulo computation on x86 #101028
    9.0.0
  • arm64: ror+eor -> eor, ror #101027
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Trivial use of Delegate.Method is not enabling delegate targets for reflection #101026
    9.0.0
  • I think that `Partition.Trim(...)` from `ArraySharedPool<T>` may be doing some unnecessary work #101025
  • [API Proposal]: WrappedValueAttribute describing a type that wraps another value #101023
  • .NET 6 Linux ClientWebSocket memory leak #101022
  • Use another Core Assembly with `PersistedAssemblyBuilder` #101018

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: MethodInfo.Invoke overload with span<object?> instead of object?[] #101032

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't ignore the case when dataflow doesn't know what's going on #101031
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for containing RotateLeft/RotateRight on Arm64 #101030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Activator.CreateInstance for shared generic structs #101021
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tiny improvement of `StringBuilder.Append(StringBuilder)` #101020
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 123.0.6312.122, windows: 123.0.6312.122 #101017
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Use multi-reg load/store for DecodeFromUTF8 #100589
    arch-arm64, area-System.Memory, community-contribution

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Bump NugetPackagingVersion to 6.2.4 #101033
    Servicing-consider, needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #100984
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-codeflow
  • Drop generic type constraints from Unsafe.BitCast #100842
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Unify debug views of immutable dictionaries #100745
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement a JSON contract reader #100966
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some volatile use on objects in corelib #100969
    area-Meta
  • Generate custom attributes from metadata instead of type system #100763
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update .gitattributes #100736
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Remove Win7 Helix queues #100986
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove Win7 Helix queues #100985
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] Remove Windows 7 helix queues #100988
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cdac] Make DAC load and use cDAC when available #100946
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
